name: Avoid Programs with more than X Subroutines  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches all the programs having more than X subroutines.
output:
This report lists RPG300 programs with more than X Subroutines.
It provides the following information:
- RPG300 Program full name 
- Number of subroutines
rationale: The transferability and the changeability of the programs are facilitated when there are not too many subroutines.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have programs with less than X Subroutines.
